section.name: ParameterParser Reference Documentation
section.p: View tool for easy parsing of ServletRequest parameters.

method.name: exists()
method.abstract: Returns true if a parameter for the specified key exists.

parameters.parameter: The key of the parameter in question

method.returns: true if a parameter for the specified key exists or false if this parameter is not present or has no value.

method.name: getString()
method.abstract: Returns the specified servlet request parameter as a String

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: The value of the parameter matching the specified key or the specified alternate String if there is no matching parameter. A value of null is returned if no alternate value is defined and the desired parameter is not found.

method.name: getBoolean()
method.abstract: Returns the specified servlet request parameter as a Boolean object or a boolean primitive type

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: A Boolean object or boolean primitive type that represents the value of the servlet request parameter matching the specified key or the specified alternate boolean if there is no matching parameter. A value of null is returned if no alternate value is defined and the desired parameter is not found.

method.name: getNumber()
method.abstract: Returns the specified servlet request parameter as a Number object

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: A java.lang.Number object that represents the value of the servlet request parameter matching the specified key or the specified alternate Number if there is no matching parameter. A value of null is returned if no alternate value is defined and the desired parameter is not found.

method.name: getInt()
method.abstract: Returns the specified servlet request parameter as an integer

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: An integer that represents the value of the servlet request parameter matching the specified key or the specified alternate value if there is no matching parameter.

method.name: getDouble()
method.abstract: Returns the specified servlet request parameter as a double

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: An double that represents the value of the servlet request parameter matching the specified key or the specified alternate value if there is no matching parameter.

method.name: getStrings()
method.abstract: Returns an array of Strings of all the values of the specified servlet request parameter

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: A array of Strings that represent all the values of the desired request parameter or null if the parameter does not exist.

method.name: getNumbers()
method.abstract: Returns an array of Numbers of all the values of the specified servlet request parameter

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: A array of java.lang.Number that represent all the values of the desired request parameter or null if the parameter does not exist.

method.name: getInts()
method.abstract: Returns an array of integers of all the values of the specified servlet request parameter

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: A array of integer primitive types that represent all the values of the desired request parameter or null if the parameter does not exist.

method.name: getDoubles()
method.abstract: Returns an array of doubles of all the values of the specified servlet request parameter

parameters.parameter: The key of the desired string parameter

method.returns: A array of double primitive types that represent all the values of the desired request parameter or null if the parameter does not exist.
